author: Sara Fischer, Ursula Perano
title: Trump's coronavirus briefings see big audiences. Some argue that's bad
description: President Trump's daily White House novel coronavirus task force briefings are attracting record viewership, but some critics say TV news networks shouldn't air them because he and administration officials have dispensed misinformation about COVID-19. Why it …
content:
